name: Calouste Gulbenkian
subtitle: Entrepreneur and philanthropist
bio: Calouste Sarkis Gulbenkian — an Armenian-British entrepreneur, known as 'Mr. Five Percent'. A major philanthropist and art collector.

name: Alexander Mantashev
subtitle: Oil industrialist and benefactor
bio: Alexander (Aleksan) Mantashev — one of the largest oil industrialists of the early 20th century and an outstanding benefactor of the Armenian community.

name: Kirk Kerkorian
subtitle: Entrepreneur, investor
bio: Kirk Kerkorian — an American entrepreneur of Armenian descent, one of the creators of modern Las Vegas, and a philanthropist.
